activeQuests.title: Superstition and Shadows
activeQuests.description: Old Tommen believes a wandering spirit haunts the village. If the party investigates, they may encounter the Wandering Shadeâ€”a restless ghost whose cryptic words offer hints about the keep and the missing villagers.

activeQuests.title: The Road to Doom
activeQuests.description: Tracking clues and rumors, the party must brave the haunted forest and reach the Keep of Doom. Along the way, they navigate treacherous terrain, spectral ambushes, and lingering wards. The forest is alive with unnatural energies, and the party may encounter allies or enemies who help or hinder their journey.

activeQuests.title: Lost in the Dark
activeQuests.description: The party finds evidence of a wounded villager (Scout Elen’s trail) and can choose to follow it. This detour leads to an encounter with hostile forest spirits and potentially the rescue of Scout Elen.

activeQuests.title: Circle of the Wild Heart
activeQuests.description: The party may encounter Druidess Halwen or Feyfriend Lirael, who offer cryptic warnings or aid against the keep’s curse—if the party helps drive off a corrupted beast menacing the woods.
